name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in API design and integrations, proficient in developing and optimizing high-performance applications. Skilled in **Kotlin**, **Coroutines**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and REST/GraphQL API design, with a strong background in using **Linux** environments. Adept at creating robust backend solutions and implementing integration strategies that streamline data workflows and enhance system interoperability. Demonstrated ability to deliver projects in compliance with industry standards, leveraging experience in healthcare and financial sectors.

Fluent in English (C1) and German (B1), I also possess hands-on expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and full development stacks like **Node.js** and **FastAPI**. My experience includes building AI/ML-powered applications and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure** while ensuring effective CI/CD pipeline integration.
